snippet: The Denver Broncos announced that they agreed to terms with Coach John Fox on a new three-year contract through the 2016 season.
abstract: Denver Broncos announce they have agreed to terms with coach John Fox on a new three-year contract through the 2016 season.
lead_paragraph: The Denver Broncos announced that they agreed to terms with Coach John Fox on a new three-year contract through the 2016 season.
